goal.tools.mc.program.goal

Class GOALState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.BitSet
      • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.GOALState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GOALState
extends java.util.BitSet
implements State
    Represents a state in program automaton corresponding to a single-agent GOAL system in the absence of an environment as represented by GOALProg.
    Author:
    Sungshik
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        q - - Characterization of the state to be constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • minus

        public GOALState minus(GOALState q)
        Computes a new program state by "subtracting" the specified state from this state. That is, bits are compared pairwise as follows. Let i, j, and k be bits in, respectively, this state, the specified state, and the resulting state. Then:
        • i=0 and j=0 : k=0
        • i=0 and j=1 : k=0
        • i=1 and j=0 : k=1
        • i=1 and j=1 : k=0
        Parameters:
        q - - The state to subtract from this state.
        Returns:
        The state resulting from subtracting q from this state.
